page.title: 12Industry in Beverley (East)
page.content: At one time Beverley had a ship yard that launched ships sideways into the River Hull, but that is now closed. We went looking on Swinemoor Industrial Estate to see which industries were now taking the place of shipbuilding. This is what we found. The largest firm is, "Marine Containers". They make and repair huge metal containers to be used on ships using Hull, Goole, Immimgham and other nearby ports. We also saw firms that made caravans,boat-builders,a firm hiring portable toilets,plant hire firms,builders merchants,garages for cars,council offices,an ambulance station and a firm that made bedroom furniture and kitchens.
